content: *crocheted in super-soft chinchilla this cap and scarf set will soothe and warm chemotherapy patients in high style berroco * materials berroco chinchilla 50 grs 1 ball #5344 pink champagne for cap 1 ball for scarf crochet hook size 6 00 mm j 1 small safety pin for marker matching scarf 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crochet-chemo-cap--scarflet-scarf
